message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8000?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $8200.
I appreciate your concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $7500?
I'm willing to make another concession, Bob. I'm now offering the product to you for $7800.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $7000?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $7100.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $6800?
